<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;recognized unrealized loss on interest rate swaps incurred by the Waha JVs, which are composed of our equity interests in two joint ventures (as defined in Note 4 - Fair Value of Financial Instruments in the notes to the audited consolidated financial statements, which is incorporated by reference), and equity in losses from our equity investees in the Oil and Gas segment.

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Provision for income taxes.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;Income tax expense was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$92 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;as compared with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$12 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	an increase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$80 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. Pre-tax income was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$226 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, as compared with pre-tax losses of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$68 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. Income tax expense in 2015 included the effect of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$3 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in connection with the cumulative revaluation of certain deferred tax liabilities pursuant to an Alberta provincial income tax law that was enacted in June 2015. For the year ended December 31, 2015, we had a provision for income tax despite having pre-tax losses
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	34
</FONT>

<A NAME="eolPage35"></A>

</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	because the amount of our permanent differences, primarily related to the impairment of goodwill, exceeded our pre-tax losses. In addition to these items, our overall state tax rate decreased in 2016 as compared with 2015.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Analysis of EBITDA by segment
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Communications Segment.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;EBITDA for our Communications segment was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$245 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	10.5%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of revenue in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$195 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	9.9%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of revenue in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, an increase of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$50 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	26%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. Higher&#160;revenue contributed&#160;an increase&#160;of&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$35 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#160;in EBITDA. As a percentage of revenue, EBITDA&#160;increased&#160;by approximately&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	70
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;basis points, or approximately&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$15 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	.&#160; For the&#160;year ended&#160;December 31, 2015, Communications segment EBITDA included approximately&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$18 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of acquisition integration costs, whereas Communications segment EBITDA for 2016&#160;included a gain of approximately&#160;$10 million from a settlement in connection with a previously acquired business.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Oil and Gas Segment.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	EBITDA for our Oil and Gas segment was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$297 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	14.7%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of revenue in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$157 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	10.5%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of revenue in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, an increase of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$140 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	89%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. Higher&#160;revenue contributed&#160;an increase&#160;of&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$56 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in EBITDA. As a percentage of revenue, Oil and Gas segment EBITDA&#160;increased&#160;by approximately&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	420
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#160;basis points, or approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$85 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, from a combination of project efficiencies and mix, as well as improved cost and overhead utilization due to higher levels of revenue, partially offset by a previously disclosed first quarter project loss of&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$13.5 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;on a western Canadian oil and gas project and restructuring charges of approximately&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$6 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#160;related to efforts to streamline our western Canadian oil and gas operations, both of which were substantially completed by December 31, 2016.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;

	$71 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">

	20.9%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2015
</FONT>

	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	an increase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in EBITDA of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$28 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. Electrical Transmission results for the&#160;year ended&#160;December 31, 2016&#160;included restructuring charges of approximately&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$9 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#160;related to efforts to streamline operations, which were substantially completed by December 31, 2016, and a previously disclosed first quarter project loss of approximately&#160;

	$15 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$12 million

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	charge related to a settlement reached during a court mandated mediation. Electrical Transmission EBITDA in 2016 was positively affected as compared with 2015 due to higher levels of revenue and improved levels of project efficiencies as compared to the prior year.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">

	$18 million
</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	4.5%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of revenue, as compared with EBITDA of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$9 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2.3%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of revenue,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	an increase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$9 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	107%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. The increase is primarily due to the non-recurrence of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$21 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#160;of losses on a troubled wind project in Canada that was completed in 2015, offset by changes in project timing and mix, as well as increased cost investments in business development initiatives in 2016.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;&#32;

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$19 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, an increase in EBITDA of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$16 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. Other segment EBITDA for the&#160;years ended&#160;December 31, 2016&#160;and&#160;2015&#160;included&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$5 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#160;and&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$16 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, respectively, of project losses on a proportionately consolidated non-controlled Canadian joint venture, for which we have minimal direct construction involvement. This project has experienced delays due to issues with receipt of a key material, which has extended the project timeline and resulted in losses. The material was received in the second half of 2016, and this project is now expected to be substantially completed in first half of 2017. Other segment EBITDA in 2015 included
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$4 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of recognized unrealized losses on interest rate swaps incurred by the Waha JVs, whereas in 2016, unrecognized unrealized gains on these swaps are reflected in other comprehensive income.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.

	$121 million

	$47 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">

	$79 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	of goodwill and intangible asset impairment and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$16 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of costs related to the Audit Committee independent investigation, offset, in part, by a net reduction of $20 million&#160;in the estimated earn-out liability for acquired businesses. For the&#160;year ended&#160;December 31, 2016, various other corporate expenses increased by approximately&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$27 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#160;as compared with the prior year period, including costs to support planned growth initiatives, timing of legal and other settlements, professional fees and incentive compensation expense.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Comparison of Years Ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Revenue
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;&#32;Our revenue was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$4,208 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in 2015 as compared with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$4,612 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in 2014,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	a decrease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$403 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	8.7%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. Oil and Gas revenue decreased by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$236 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	14%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, Electrical Transmission revenue decreased by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$130 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	28%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, and Communications revenue decreased by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$68 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	3%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. These decreases were offset, in part, by increases in Power Generation and Industrial revenue of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$25 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	7%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, and an increase in Other segment revenue of $9 million, or 64%. Acquisitions contributed a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$302 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;increase in revenue, whereas organic revenue declined by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$705 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, due to lower levels of activity in our Oil and Gas segment, lower levels of wireless services in our Communications segment and lower levels of activity in our Electrical Transmission segment. A discussion of revenue by segment follows below.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Communications Segment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;&#32;Communications revenue was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$1,973 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in 2015 as compared with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$2,041 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in 2014, a decrease of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$68 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	3%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. Acquisitions contributed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$209 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of additional revenue, whereas organic revenue declined by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$276 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;versus the prior year, primarily as a result of lower levels of wireless services due to changes in our wireless customers&#8217; capital spending plans. The decrease in wireless revenue was partially offset by an increase from certain utility services, including wireline/fiber network project activity.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Oil and Gas Segment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. Oil and Gas revenue was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$1,495 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in 2015, as compared with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$1,731 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, a decrease of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$236 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	14%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. Acquisitions contributed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$89 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of additional revenue, whereas organic revenue declined by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$325 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;as compared with the same period in the prior year. The decline in organic revenue resulted from lower overall levels of gathering pipeline and related facilities project activities in our Canadian operations due to the decline in oil prices, reduced levels of long-haul pipeline project activity in 2015, and the negative effect of fluctuations in foreign currency exchange rates on our Canadian operations as compared with the prior year.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	35
</FONT>
</DIV>

<A NAME="eolPage36"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Electrical Transmission Segment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. Electrical Transmission revenue was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$341 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in 2015, as compared with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$472 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, a decrease of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$130 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	28%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. Electrical transmission revenue in 2015 included the effect of adverse weather disruptions and site-related project inefficiencies, as well as reduced project activity from the combination of lower overall market activity levels due to project delays and lower than expected success rates on new project awards during 2015 as a result of management diversion from business operations and marketing due to the Audit Committee&#8217;s independent investigation that was concluded in December 2015.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Power Generation and Industrial Segment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. Power Generation and Industrial revenue was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$382 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in 2015, as compared with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$357 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in 2014, an increase of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$25 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	7%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. The increase was primarily caused by a greater number of renewable power projects as compared with the prior year.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Other Segment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. Other segment revenue was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$24 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in 2015, as compared with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$15 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, an increase of $9 million, or 64%. The increase was primarily related to increased oil and gas operations in Mexico, as well as revenue from a proportionately consolidated non-controlled Canadian joint venture that was acquired in 2014.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Costs of revenue, excluding depreciation and amortization.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;Costs of revenue, excluding depreciation and amortization, decreased by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$257 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	6.5%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$3,721 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in 2015 from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$3,978 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in 2014. Lower revenue resulted in a decrease of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$348 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in costs of revenue, excluding depreciation and amortization, whereas decreased productivity resulted in an increase of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$91 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. Costs of revenue, excluding depreciation and amortization, as a percentage of revenue increased by approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	220
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;basis points, from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	86.3%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of revenue in 2014 to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	88.4%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of revenue in 2015. This increase was driven by increased costs in our Electrical Transmission, Power Generation and Industrial, Other and Oil and Gas segments. Increased costs in our Electrical Transmission segment were due to lower levels of cost utilization from reduced levels of revenue, site-related project inefficiencies and the effects of adverse weather conditions. Costs of revenue, excluding depreciation and amortization, as a percentage of revenue increased in our Power Generation and Industrial segment due to project losses of approximately $21 million on a troubled wind project in Canada that was completed in 2015 and in our Other business segment from project losses of approximately $16 million on a proportionately consolidated non-controlled Canadian joint venture. Our Oil and Gas segment incurred higher costs as a percentage of revenue in 2015 due to production inefficiencies from lower levels of revenue, as discussed above. These increases in costs of revenue, excluding depreciation and amortization, as a percent of revenue, were partially offset by productivity improvements in our Communications segment.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Depreciation and amortization.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;&#32;Depreciation and amortization was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$170 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	4.0%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of revenue in 2015, as compared with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$154 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	3.3%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of revenue in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, an increase of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$15 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	9.8%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. Acquisitions contributed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$18 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of depreciation and amortization expense, whereas organic depreciation and amortization expense decreased by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$3 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;as compared with the prior year.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Goodwill and intangible asset impairment.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;&#32;We incurred $78.6 million of goodwill and intangible asset impairment in 2015 related to a reporting unit in our Oil and Gas segment. See
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Note 1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Business, Basis of Presentation and Significant Accounting Policies
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in the notes to the audited consolidated financial statements, which is incorporated by reference, for additional details.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	General and administrative expense.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#32;&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	General and administrative expenses were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$266 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	6.3%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of revenue in 2015, as compared with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$238 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	5.2%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of revenue in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, an increase of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$28 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	11.6%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. Acquisitions contributed approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$6 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of incremental general and administrative costs, excluding acquisition integration costs incurred in connection with the WesTower acquisition. Acquisition integration costs and the Audit Committee&#8217;s independent investigation contributed $13 million and $16 million, respectively, of the increase in general and administrative expenses in 2015, in addition to an increase in other legal costs. These increases were partially offset by decreases in non-cash stock based and incentive compensation expense. As a percentage of revenue, general and administrative expenses increased by approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	110
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;basis points.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Interest expense, net.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;Interest expense, net of interest income, was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$48 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in 2015, or 1.1% of revenue, as compared with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$51 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	1.1%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of revenue in 2014, a decrease of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$3 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	5.3%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. In 2014, our senior convertible notes matured and were converted, which reduced our interest expense in 2015. The decrease in interest expense in 2015 from our senior convertible notes was partially offset by incremental interest expense on our credit facilities as a result of higher average outstanding borrowings, as well as from discount fees associated with financing arrangements and consent solicitation agent fees due to the delay in filing of our 2014 Form 10-K and 2015 First Quarter Form 10-Q.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:30PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Equity in losses of unconsolidated affiliates.&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Equity in losses of unconsolidated affiliates includes our share of income or losses from equity investees. For the&#160;year ended&#160;December 31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, equity in losses from unconsolidated affiliates was approximately&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$8 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, including a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$4 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;recognized unrealized loss on interest rate swaps incurred by our Waha JVs and equity in losses from our equity investees in the Oil and Gas segment. &#160;For the&#160;year ended&#160;December 31, 2014, equity in losses of unconsolidated affiliates was de minimis.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Other income, net.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;&#32;Other income, net, was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$15 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in 2015, as compared with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$8 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. Other income, net, consists primarily of gains or losses from sales of assets and investments, certain legal/other settlements and gains or losses from changes to estimated earn-out accruals. Other income, net, in 2015 includes a $12 million charge related to a court mandated mediation settlement. These losses were offset by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$20 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of a net reduction in the estimated earn-out liability for acquired businesses. Gains on sales of equipment were approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$8 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in 2015 as compared with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$6 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in 2014.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Provision for income taxes.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;Income tax expense was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$12 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in 2015 as compared with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$76 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, a decrease of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$64 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. Pre-tax income in 2014 was $198 million as compared with pre-tax losses of $68 million in 2015. Income tax expense in 2015 includes the effect of approximately $3 million incurred in connection with the cumulative revaluation of certain deferred tax liabilities pursuant to an Alberta provincial income tax law that was enacted in June 2015. For the year ended December 31, 2015, we had a provision for income tax despite having pre-tax losses because the amount of our permanent differences, primarily related to the impairment of goodwill, exceeded our pre-tax losses.
</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Loss from discontinued operations.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;&#32;Loss from discontinued operations, net of tax, was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$6 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in 2014. In 2014, management determined that the contingent assets associated with Globetec, which was sold in 2013, were not recoverable and recorded related losses on disposal of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$6 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, net of tax.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Analysis of EBITDA by segment
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Communications Segment.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;EBITDA for our Communications segment was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$195 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	9.9%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of revenue in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$204 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	10.0%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of revenue in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, a decrease of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$9 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	4%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. Communications segment EBITDA for 2015 includes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$18 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of acquisition integration costs associated with the WesTower acquisition, as compared with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$5 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in 2014. As a percentage of revenue, EBITDA decreased by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;basis points, or approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$2 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, due to acquisition integration costs from the WesTower acquisition, offset, in part, by production efficiencies and improved cost utilization.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Oil and Gas Segment.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	EBITDA for our Oil and Gas segment was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$157 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	10.5%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of revenue in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$195 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	11.3%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of revenue in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, a decrease of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$38 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	20%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. As a percentage of revenue, EBITDA decreased approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	80
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;basis points, or approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$12 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, due to production inefficiencies resulting from lower levels of revenue as a result of lower overall levels of gathering pipeline and related facilities project activities in our Canadian operations due to the decline in oil prices and reduced levels of long-haul pipeline project activity in 2015. In addition, fluctuations in foreign currency exchange rates had a negative effect on EBITDA for our Canadian operations as compared with the same period in the prior year.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Electrical Transmission Segment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;&#32;EBITDA for our Electrical Transmission segment was negative
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$71 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or negative
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	20.9%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of revenue in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, as compared with EBITDA of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$45 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	9.5%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of revenue in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, a decrease in EBITDA of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$116 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. Lower revenue contributed approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$12 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of the decrease in EBITDA. Additionally, in the third quarter of 2015, our Electrical Transmission segment recorded a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$12 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;charge related to a settlement reached as a result of a court mandated mediation. Electrical Transmission segment EBITDA has also been negatively affected by lower levels of cost utilization from reduced levels of revenue as compared with the prior year, as well as the effects of site-related project inefficiencies, adverse weather disruptions and higher legal costs. This segment was the primary focus of the Audit Committee independent investigation that was concluded in December 2015, which significantly diverted management&#8217;s attention from its operations and marketing efforts.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Power Generation and Industrial Segment.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;&#32;EBITDA for our Power Generation and Industrial segment was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$9 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2.3%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of revenue, as compared with EBITDA of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$14 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in 2014, or 4% of revenue, a decrease of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$5 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or 38%. Power Generation and Industrial segment EBITDA for 2015 includes $21 million of losses on a troubled Canadian wind project that was completed in 2015. As a percentage of revenue, EBITDA decreased by approximately 170 basis points. The basis point decrease resulting from this project was partially offset by improved cost utilization from higher levels of revenue and other project efficiencies.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">

	$19 million
</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of EBITDA in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. Other segment EBITDA in 2015 includes a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$4 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;recognized unrealized loss on interest rate swaps incurred by our equity method investments in two joint ventures formed to design and construct pipelines that will interconnect at the U.S./Mexico border, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$16 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of losses on a proportionately consolidated non-controlled Canadian joint venture that was acquired in 2014 and has experienced project delays. These losses were offset, in part, by positive EBITDA in our international operations.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$121 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">

	$53 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2014

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$78.6 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of goodwill and intangible asset impairment and
</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of costs related to the Audit Committee independent investigation. The increase in negative Corporate EBITDA was offset, in part, by a net reduction in the estimated earn-out liability for acquired businesses and a reduction in stock-based and incentive compensation expense. See
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Note 1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;-
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in the notes to the audited consolidated financial statements, which is incorporated by reference, for details regarding the 2015 goodwill and intangible asset impairment.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Foreign Operations
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Our foreign operations are primarily in Canada and Mexico. See
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">

</FONT>

<DIV>
<A NAME="MTZ12311610-K_HTM_S703DD153248C75E402EFC81EE2DFCB35">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Non-U.S. GAAP Financial Measures
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	As appropriate, we supplement our reported U.S. GAAP financial information with certain non-U.S. GAAP financial measures, including earnings before interest, income taxes, depreciation and amortization (&#8220;EBITDA&#8221;). In addition, we have presented adjusted EBITDA (&#8220;Adjusted EBITDA&#8221;), as well as adjusted net income from continuing operations (&#8220;Adjusted Net Income From Continuing Operations&#8221;) and adjusted diluted earnings per share from continuing operations (&#8220;Adjusted Diluted Earnings Per Share From Continuing Operations&#8221;). The &#8220;adjusted&#8221; non-U.S. GAAP measures exclude, as applicable to the particular periods, non-cash stock-based compensation expense, goodwill and intangible asset impairment, restructuring charges, acquisition integration costs resulting from the WesTower acquisition, Audit Committee independent investigation related costs, project losses on a proportionately consolidated non-controlled Canadian joint venture, for which we have minimal direct construction involvement, charges from a settlement reached during a court mandated mediation, gains or losses on equity investee interest rate swaps and, for Adjusted Net Income from Continuing Operations, the effect of an Alberta provincial income tax rate increase. See
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Note 9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;- Stock-Based Compensation and Other Employee Benefit Plans,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Note 1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Business, Basis of Presentation and Significant Accounting Policies
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Note 13
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Segments and Related Information and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Note 4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Fair Value of Financial Instruments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in the notes to the audited consolidated financial statements, which are incorporated by reference. The definitions of EBITDA and Adjusted EBITDA above are not the same as in our Credit Facility or in the indenture governing our notes; therefore, EBITDA and Adjusted EBITDA as presented in this discussion should not be used for purposes of determining our compliance with the covenants contained in our debt instruments.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	37
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage38"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	We use EBITDA and Adjusted EBITDA, as well as Adjusted Net Income From Continuing Operations and Adjusted Diluted Earnings Per Share From Continuing Operations to evaluate our performance, both internally and as compared with our peers, because these measures exclude certain items that may not be indicative of our core operating results, as well as items that can vary widely across different industries or among companies within the same industry, and for non-cash stock-based compensation expense, can also be subject to market volatility or variations in the value of shares granted. Additionally, these measures provide a baseline for analyzing trends in our underlying business. Management also considers EBITDA and Adjusted EBITDA as indicators of our ability to generate cash to service debt, fund capital expenditures and expand our business, but management does not consider the presented non-U.S. GAAP financial measures as measures of our liquidity. While EBITDA and Adjusted EBITDA are measures of our ability to generate cash, these measures exclude the cash impact of changes in our assets and liabilities as well as interest and income taxes. Net cash provided by operating activities in the consolidated statements of cash flows accounts for these changes in our assets and liabilities.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;PADDING-TOP:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	We believe these non-U.S. GAAP financial measures provide meaningful information and help investors understand our financial results and assess our prospects for future performance. Because non-U.S. GAAP financial measures are not standardized, it may not be possible to compare these financial measures with other companies&#8217; non-U.S. GAAP financial measures having the same or similar names. These financial measures should not be considered in isolation from, as substitutes for, or alternative measures of, reported net income (loss) from continuing operations, diluted earnings (loss) per share from continuing operations and net cash provided by operating activities, and should be viewed in conjunction with the most comparable U.S. GAAP financial measures and the provided reconciliations thereto. We believe these non-U.S. GAAP financial measures, when viewed together with our U.S. GAAP results and related reconciliations, provide a more complete understanding of our business. We strongly encourage investors to review our consolidated financial statements and publicly filed reports in their entirety and not rely on any single financial measure.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The following table presents a reconciliation of EBITDA and Adjusted EBITDA to net income (loss) from continuing operations, in dollar and percentage of revenue terms, for the years indicated (dollar amounts in millions). The tables below may contain slight summation differences due to rounding.
</FONT>
</DIV>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Adjusted Net Income From Continuing Operations and Adjusted Diluted Earnings Per Share From Continuing Operations
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The table below reconciles Adjusted Net Income From Continuing Operations and Adjusted Diluted Earnings Per Share From Continuing Operations with reported net income (loss) from continuing operations and reported diluted earnings (loss) per share from continuing operations, the most directly comparable U.S. GAAP financial measures. Adjustments have been tax-effected using the effective tax rate from continuing operations for the respective periods, excluding certain discrete items.
